FileFormat.FormatDescription: CATIA is a 3D modelling software created by Dassault Syst√®mes, widely used across many industries for computer aided design, manufacture and engineering. Model files store representations of mechanical structures, or parts of structures.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Library Research Group / MIT Libraries
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: 11/2023 (v.115)- Max-offset modified for BOF signature to allow for more exact signature identification. Internally researched. 04/2024 (v.118) changed first range of bytes from {2024} to *. Submitted by the J. Paul Getty Trust.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF offset 80, magic bytes: CATIA followed by three spaces*CATIA SOLUTIONS V4{6}RELEASE followed by one space
